thread.title: Metallica’s James Hetfield Sings Into a Non-Working Microphone During Collaboration With Lady Gaga
thread.title_full: Metallica’s James Hetfield Sings Into a Non-Working Microphone During Collaboration With Lady Gaga

author: Dana Eisenberg
title: Metallica’s James Hetfield Sings Into a Non-Working Microphone During Collaboration With Lady Gaga
text:
Metallica’s James Hetfield Sings Into a Non-Working Microphone During Collaboration With Lady Gaga by Dana Eisenberg | 10:19   
The Grammys seem to be having some sound issues tonight. During Metallica ‘s collaboration with Lady Gaga , James Hetfield spent a few moments singing into a non-working microphone. 
Gaga’s mic was working fine, and eventually Hetfield went over and shared with her. Later in the performance, he sang into his own microphone and it worked again.
